33 #include "CompareFunc.h"
34 #include "MatrixHelper.h"
35 using namespace Mutation;
36 
37 #include <fstream>
38 #include <iostream>
39 #include <string>
40 using namespace std;
41 
42 #include <Eigen/Dense>
43 using namespace Eigen;
44 
45 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
46 {
47  // Open the file
48  ifstream file(argv[1]);
49 
50  // Load the mixture
51  string mix_name;
52  getline(file, mix_name);
53  Mixture mix(mix_name);
54 
55  // Load the state variable information
56  string str;
57  getline(file, str);
58  int var_set, n1, n2;
59  stringstream s1(str); s1 >> var_set >> n1 >> n2;
60 
61  // Load the function for comparison and tolerance
62  getline(file, str);
63  string fun; double tol;
64  stringstream s2(str); s2 >> fun >> tol;
65 
66  CompareFunc* function =
67  Utilities::Config::Factory<CompareFunc>::create(fun, tol);
68 
69  // Load the state variables and data to compare to
70  MatrixXd data = readMatrix(file);
71  const int result_size = data.cols()-n1-n2;
72 
73  // Close the file
74  file.close();
75 
76  // Loop over the states
77  double v1 [n1];
78  double v2 [n2];
79  bool matches = true;
80 
81  VectorXd result(result_size);
82 
83 
84  int precision = 10;
85  int width = precision+8;
86  cout << mix_name << endl;
87  cout << var_set << " " << n1 << " " << n2 << endl;
88  cout << fun << " 1.0e-" << precision << endl;
89 
90  for (int i = 0; i < data.rows(); ++i) {
91  // Set the state of the mixture
92  Map<VectorXd>(v1,n1) = data.row(i).segment( 0,n1);
93  Map<VectorXd>(v2,n2) = data.row(i).segment(n1,n2);
94  mix.setState(v1, v2, var_set);
95 
96  // Compute the functions
97  function->compute(mix, result);
98 
99  // Print the data back out
100  cout.precision(precision); cout.setf(ios::scientific);
101  for (int j = 0; j < n1+n2; ++j)
102  cout << setw(width) << data(i,j);
103  for (int j = 0; j < result_size; ++j)
104  cout << setw(width) << result(j);
105  cout << endl;
106  }
107 
108  // Return 0 on success
109  return 0;
110 }
CompareFunc.h
Provides self registering function comparison classes.

Provides some helper functions for matrices.
